SA07n932:2: munau bruvāṇe'pi tu tatra dharmaṃ dharmaṃ prati jñātiṣu cādṛteṣu |
SA07n932:4: sa cakravākyeva hi cakravākastayā sametaḥ priyayā priyārhaḥ |
SA07n932:5: nācintayad vaiśramaṇaṃ na śakraṃ tatsthānahetoḥ kuta eva dharmam ||2 ||
SA07n932:6: lakṣmyā ca rūpeṇa ca sundarīti stambhena garveṇa ca māninīti |
SA07n932:7: dīptyā ca mānena ca bhāminīti yāto babhāṣe trividhena nāmnā ||3 ||
SA07n932:11: manuṣyaloke hi tadā babhūva sā sundarī strīṣu nareṣu nandaḥ ||5 ||
SA07n932:12: sā devatā nandanacāriṇīva kulasya nandījananaśca nandaḥ |
SA07n932:14: tāṃ sundarī cenna labheta nandaḥ sā vā niṣeveta na taṃ natabhrūḥ |
SA07n932:15: dvandvaṃ dhruvaṃ tadvikalaṃ na śobhetānyonyahīnāviva rātricandrau ||7 ||
SA07n932:24: vibhūṣayāmāsa tataḥ priyāṃ sa siṣeviṣustāṃ na mṛjāvahārtham |
SA07n932:25: svenaiva rūpeṇa vibhūṣitā hi vibhūṣaṇānāmapi bhūṣaṇaṃ sā ||12 ||
SA07n932:26: dattvātha sā darpaṇamasya haste mamāgrato dhāraya tāvadenam |
SA07n932:27: viśeṣakaṃ yāvadahaṃ karomītyuvāca kāntaṃ sa ca taṃ babhāra ||13 ||
SA07n932:28: bhartustataḥ śmaśru nirīkṣamāṇā viśeṣakaṃ sāpi cakāra tādṛk |
SA07n932:29: niśvāsavātena ca darpaṇasya cikitsayitvā nijaghāna nandaḥ ||14 ||
SA07n932:30: sā tena ceṣṭālalitena bhartuḥ śāṭhyena cāntarmanasā jahāsa |
SA07n932:31: bhavecca ruṣṭā kila nāma tasmai lalāṭajihmāṃ bhṛkuṭiṃ cakāra ||15 ||
SA07n932:32: cikṣepa karṇotpalamasya cāṃse kareṇa savyena madālasena |
SA07n932:35: padbhyāṃ priyāyā nalinopabhābhyāṃ mūrdhnā bhayānnāma nanāma nandaḥ ||17 ||
SA07n932:36: sa muktapuṣponmiṣitena mūrdhnā tataḥ priyāyāḥ priyakṛd babhāse |
SA07n932:42: tasyā mukhaṃ tat satamālapatraṃ tāmrādharauṣṭhaṃ cikurāyatākṣam |
SA07n932:47: nandaḥ priyāyā mukhamīkṣamāṇo bhūyaḥ priyānandakaro babhūva ||23 ||
SA07n932:48: vimānakalpe sa vimānagarbhe tatastathā caiva nananda nandaḥ |
SA07n932:50: avāṅamukho niṣpraṇāyaśca tasthau bhrāturgṛhe'nyasya gṛhe yathaiva |
SA07n932:53: ayojayat snānavidhiṃ tathānyā jagranthuranyāḥ surabhīḥ srajaśca ||26 ||
SA07n932:54: tasmin gṛhe bharturataścarantyaḥ krīḍānurūpaṃ lalitaṃ niyogam |
SA07n932:55: kāścinna buddhaṃ dadṛśuryuvatyo buddhasya vaiṣā niyataṃ manīṣā ||27 ||
SA07n932:56: kācit sthitā tatra tu harmyapṛṣṭhe gavākṣapakṣe praṇidhāya cakṣuḥ |
SA07n932:58: sā gauravaṃ tatra vicārya bhartuḥ svayā ca bhaktyārhatayārhataśca |
SA07n932:59: nandasya tasthau purato vivakṣustadājñayā ceti tadācacakṣe ||29 ||
SA07n932:60: anugrahāyāsya janasya śaṅke gururgṛhaṃ no bhagavān praviṣṭaḥ |
SA07n932:61: bhikṣāmalabdhvā giramāsanaṃ vā śūnyādaraṇyādiva yāti bhūyaḥ ||30 ||
SA07n932:62: śrutvā maharṣeḥ sa gṛhapraveśaṃ satkārahīnaṃ ca punaḥ prayāṇam |
SA07n932:64: kṛtvāñjaliṃ mūrdhani padmakalpaṃ tataḥ sa kāntāṃ gamanaṃ yayāce |
SA07n932:66: sā vepamānā parisasvaje taṃ śālaṃ latā vātasamīriteva |
SA07n932:67: dadarśa cāśruplutalolanetrā dīrghe ca niśvasya vaco'bhyuvāca ||33 ||
SA07n932:69: gacchāryaputraihi ca śīghrameva viśeṣako yāvadayaṃ na śuṣkaḥ ||34 ||
SA07n932:70: sacedbhavestvaṃ khalu dīrghasūtro daṇḍaṃ mahāntaṃ tvayi pātayeyam |
SA07n932:71: muhurmuhustvāṃ śayitaṃ kucābhyāṃ vibodhayeyaṃ ca na cālapeyam ||35 ||
SA07n932:75: evaṃ kariṣyāmi vimuñca caṇḍi yāvad gururdūragato na me saḥ ||37 ||
SA07n932:76: tataḥ stanodvartitatacandanābhyāṃ mukto bhujābhyāṃ na tu mānasena |
SA07n932:77: vihāya veṣaṃ madanānurūpaṃ satkārayogyaṃ sa vapurbabhāra ||38 ||
SA07n932:78: sā taṃ prayāntaṃ ramaṇaṃ pradadhyau pradhyānaśūnyasthitaniścalākṣī |
SA07n932:79: sthitoccakarṇā vyapaviddhaśaṣpā bhrāntaṃ mṛgam bhrāntamukhī mṛgīva ||39 ||
SA07n932:80: didṛkṣayākṣiptamanā munestu nandaḥ prayāṇaṃ prati tatvare ca |
SA07n932:81: vivṛttadṛṣṭiśca śanairyayau tāṃ karīva paśyan sa laḍatkareṇum ||40 ||
SA07n932:83: kākṣeṇa paśyan na tatarpa nandaḥ pibannivaikena jalaṃ kareṇa ||41 ||
SA07n932:84: taṃ gauravaṃ buddhagataṃ cakarṣa bhāryānurāgaḥ punarācakarṣa |
SA07n932:85: so'niścayānnāpi yayau na tasthau turaṃstaraṃgeṣviva rājahaṃsaḥ ||42 ||
SA07n932:87: śrutvā tato nūpuranisvanaṃ sa punarlalambe hṛdaye gṛhītaḥ ||43 ||
SA07n932:88: sa kāmarāgeṇa nigṛhyamāṇo dharmānurāgeṇa ca kṛṣyamāṇaḥ |
SA07n932:89: jagāma duḥkhena vivartyamānaḥ plavaḥ pratistrota ivāpagāyāḥ ||44 ||
SA07n932:90: tataḥ kramairdīrghatamaiḥ pracakrame kathaṃ nu yāto na gururbhavediti |
SA07n932:91: svajeya tāṃ caiva viśeṣakapriyāṃ kathaṃ priyāmārdraviśeṣakāmiti ||45 ||
SA07n932:92: atha sa pathi dadarśa muktamānaṃ pitṛnagare'pi tathā gatābhimānam |
SA07n932:94: saundarananda mahākāvye “bhāryā-yācitaka“ nāma caturtha sarga samāpta |
